data.quote: Attitude is a choice. Happiness is a choice. Optimism is a choice. Kindness is a choice. Giving is a choice. Respect is a choice. Whatever choice you make makes you. Choose wisely.
data.author: Roy T. Bennett

data.quote: When someone tells me 'no,' it doesn't mean I can't do it, it simply means I can't do it with them.
data.author: Karen E. Quinones Miller

data.quote: You'll never get ahead of anyone as long as you try to get even with him.
data.author: Lou Holtz

data.quote: If you start by promising what you don't even have yet, you'll lose your desire to work towards getting it.
data.author: Paulo Coelho, The Alchemist

data.quote: The individual who says it is not possible should move out of the way of those doing it.
data.author: Tricia Cunningham

data.quote: If you have a dream, donâ€™t just sit there. Gather courage to believe that you can succeed and leave no stone unturned to make it a reality.
data.author: Dr Roopleen

data.quote: And will you succeed? Yes indeed, yes indeed! Ninety-eight and three-quarters percent guaranteed!
data.author: Dr. Suess

data.quote: All great achievements require time.
data.author: Maya Angelou

data.quote: All men want, not something to do with, but something to do, or rather something to be.
data.author: Henry David Thoreau

data.quote: Stay strong, stay positive, and never give up.
data.author: Roy T. Bennett

data.quote: Be with someone who inspires you and makes you be the best version of yourself.
data.author: Roy T. Bennett

data.quote: Focus on making yourself better, not on thinking that you are better.
data.author: Bohdi Sanders

data.quote: Control Your Own Destiny or Someone Else Will
data.author: Jack Welch

data.quote: Life's short. Live passionately.
data.author: Marc A. Pitman

data.quote: The road to success is always under construction
data.author: Lily Tomlin

data.quote: Life always begins with one step outside of your comfort zone.
data.author: Shannon L. Alder

data.quote: A challenge only becomes an obstacle when you bow to it.
data.author: Ray A. Davis

data.quote: Never run from the enemy, tackle them
data.author: Victoria Addino

data.quote: I found an inner strength to fight for myself. It was clear that nobody else would.
data.author: Tehmina Durrani

data.quote: Talent is a wonderful thing, but it won't carry a quitter.
data.author: Stephen King

data.quote: Find a purpose to serve, not a lifestyle to live.
data.author: Criss Jami

data.quote: A birth-date is a reminder to celebrate the life as well as to update the life.
data.author: Amit Kalantri
